mapper.select: SELECT /* DP_PRODUCT_SUBCONTS-selectDPProductSubconts : mhcha123 (2014-01-03) */ PROD_ID ,SUB_CONTENTS_ID ,LCD_SIZE ,COLOR_DEPTH_CD ,AUDIO_TYPE_CD ,TOUCHSCREEN_SPRT_YN ,ITOPP_SPRT_YN ,BLUETOOTH_SPRT_YN ,GPS_SPRT_YN ,EPSD_PLAY_TM ,SALE_YN ,VM_TYPE_CD ,VM_VER ,GIGA_VER ,SOUND_3D_SPRT_YN ,VITL_KEY_SPRT_YN ,CPU_TYPE_CD ,T_PLAYER_SPRT_YN ,DRM_VER_CD ,CFM_SPRT_YN ,VIDEO_FILE_TYPE_CD ,RSLTN_CD ,DP_PG_RATIO_CD ,DP_PG_QULT_CD ,BTV_CID ,FILE_CLSF_CD ,FILE_PATH ,FILE_SIZE ,APK_VER ,APK_VER_NM ,APK_PKG_NM ,APK_API_LEVEL_CD ,APK_LABEL_NM ,REG_ID ,REG_DT ,UPD_ID ,UPD_DT FROM TB_DP_SUB_CONTENTS WHERE PROD_ID = #{prodId}
